All Classes

  • Class Description
    AnalysisPanel
    The panel used to analyze data from the database.
    App  
    ApplicationState
    Class responsible for holding the application state.
    CroatianLanguage
    The class that defines the string constants for the Croatian language.
    DateLabelFormatter
    A utility class used to format dates.
    DBConnection
    Class used to connect to the database and perform CRUD operations.
    EnglishLanguage
    The class that defines the string constants for the English language.
    ExceptionHandler
    A simple class with a single static method that can be used to pass an exception.
    HelpPanel
    A simple panel used to display information about several important parts of the application.
    IActivePanelObservable
    The interface for the app's observable state.
    IActivePanelObserver
    The interface used by any subscriber to the app's observable panel state.
    ILanguage
    The interface that should be implemented by any specific language.
    ILanguageFactory
    The interface that should be implemented by a specific language factory.
    ILanguageStateObservable
    The interface for the app's observable state.
    ILanguageStateObserver
    The interface used by any subscriber to the app's observable language state.
    LanguageFactory
    The class that provides specific languages.
    LanguageType
    Enum for language types, e.g.
    MainFrame
    The main UI window of the app.
    MenuPanel
    The panel used to switch between different active panels on the main window.
    NewsModel
    A model class representing a news report.
    PanelType
    Enum for storing different panel types that can be active (visible) in the application.
    Scraper
    A class used to scrape the news portals on the internet.
    ScraperJob
    A class responsible for the actual scraping logic.
    ScrapingPanel
    The panel used to scrape the news portals for popular topics and store the retrieved data in the database.
    SettingsPanel
    The panel used to change the app's language state.
    WebSiteInput
    A simple input panel for website urls.
    WordCounter
    A class responsible for counting the occurrence of specific topics.
